requirements: Merge all actions from memory_terminal and memory_terminal_interactive into one tool surface

Restrict headless mode to a strict allowlisted command subset
Make headless allowlist configurable in GUI settings/preferences
Deprecate and remove separate memory_terminal tool
Update all documentation and agent instructions referencing old split
constraints: Must preserve safety/authorization semantics for terminal execution
Unified contract should remain compatible enough for migration
Documentation updates must include agent instruction files
